Dear Mr./Ms. Pepsi

The bible: When discussing the bible, it is important to not that, while a few of the books have been proven to be actual history, not all of them have been. And certainly non of the supernatural occurances have actually been proven outside the words of the author of said book. Not to mention that the bible is also contradictory in a lot of points. I'm not going to go into whether or not a god exists or not, because I frankly don't care.

Phobia: A phobia is not a simple fear of something. It can also refer to a dislike of something, which a simple google search would tell you.

Animals: The reason animals were brought up is because humans are in fact animals. Also, humans did not evolve from the apes (common misconception). We do have a common ancestor tens of thousands of years ago.

Being gay is not normal. Then again, any other nationality than Chinese isn't normal either. Just because it's not normal, that doesn't make it wrong.

Because the biology of closely related species is analogous, especially when multiple species of animals exhibit homosexuality. >I have talked to many different therapists, psychiatrists, and expert doctors on it  Yeah ok lol, I'm in a 3rd world country where homosexuality is illegal and the doctors in my med school still recognize it as a normal, untreatable condition that does not hamper one's life (unlike trannies and their dysphoria).  I do agree that it isn't normal in the sense that the majority of people are (obviously) born straight, and genetic or congenital changes lead to homosexuality, what those genes or developmental issues are we do not know yet, but it doesn't really matter as it does not lower quality of life like other congenital/genetic diseases. I also agree about the media thing, woke culture is quite retarded.

Personally, from witnessing fellow friends I’ve known for years be gay, lesbian, and even transgender, some tell me, that it’s just for attention, 2 other ones (gays) told me they just liked what they saw in the porn videos.

I am not talking about animals, why would you compare a human being to an animal when clearly, I am looking for an utmost answer that makes 100% sense? Also a condition, back in the days of The Bible, it was shunned upon, and is still shunned upon now, homosexuality is a condition, a mental condition. I have talked to many different therapists, psychiatrists, and expert doctors on it, some people keep quiet, some people just don’t care, the fact of the matter is that it’s not normal, and the fact that people shun it is why not a lot of people like it in society, until now of course, because media has to use it to gain their likes, follows, respect, and earned trust through advertisement. (I really need an answer even I can agree with, I don’t even care if it’s a meme format, I’m sleepy, want to vent out my stress by getting off to my daily hentai readings, and go to sleep...)

"Slurs" are avoided by thin-skinned bitches, this isn't reddit or twitter.  All psychiatric books  (even those from the early-mid 1900s) have homosexuality as a recognized condition that is present since birth; the oldest books generally contain attempted therapies, and how to move forward with them, while more recent ones have all the data about the failures of corrective therapy. However, I do concede that "gay since birth" in humans hasn't been experimentally proven yet, but that is because it can only proven by complete isolation and analysis of thousands of infants until puberty, an experiment that will never happen; thankfully, animals exhibit homosexuality too (most since birth, others have homosexual behaviors as part of instincts),  and of those there is even a completely female species of lizards, the  New Mexico Whiptail, that has fxf reproduction. Now you'd know this if you had studied anything beyond high biology, but I doubt you've finished HS in the first place.
